titles.title: Glory To God He Lifted Me Up

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Glory to God! He lifted me up!
He lifted me up, I know!
He reached out His hand, and He lifted me up,
And that's why I love Him so.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I love Him more and more,
I love Him more and more,
And when at last I reach the other shore,
I'll praise Him more and more.
